verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sweet adoration flows from Your children. Glory and honor and praise are all part Of our constant devotion, love set in motion. For the Divine One Who reigns in our hearts.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When I am troubled, by heartache and struggle, I come and adore Him.Â He takes me away From all worldly sensations and endless temptations And all of my trials are lost in His love.{/lang-eng}
